Title: formatDateTimeInJodaSyntax
Description: Similar to formatDateTime, except that it formats datetime in Joda style instead of MySQL style. Refer to https://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html.
The opposite operation of this function is parseDateTimeInJodaSyntax.
Using replacement fields, you can define a pattern for the resulting string.
